wayne.goal: Attend a 30-minute meeting on Monday within 09:00-17:00. Provide my available time ranges for scheduling.

private_information: Free the entire Monday work day

orchestrator.goal: Integrate participants' availabilities and produce a PDDL domain and problem (for FastDownwards) encoding a meeting-scheduling problem that finds a 30-minute slot on Monday 09:00-17:00 acceptable to everyone.

public_information: Schedule a single 30-minute meeting on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00.
All participants must be available for the full 30-minute meeting.
Times are given in local work hours 09:00-17:00 on Monday.
A feasible solution exists that fits everyone's existing schedule.

availability.system_prompt: You are an assistant that reports a participant's availability. Return the participant's free time ranges (within the environment work hours) as a structured list. Do not emit PDDL.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in converting schedule constraints into a planning encoding. Produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem suitable for the FastDownwards planner that encodes the meeting-scheduling task. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
